channel.title: JAVA JDK6u4 did something so i can't run a Server or Client! Please, help needed
channel.description:
Hey, i got a problem after downloading JDK 6u4... I did what a tutorial said and i go to "Advanced" :rolleyes: Go to that option south of the box, but when i was done and clicked "Ok"... I just wanted to compile my server then because i had not, and when i compiled it said "JDK file found" :) And under that it said "Right bane not found" or something like that... :(
And now i downloaded "Golden_Scape" Client. And then i clicked "Run.bat" and what happened? :( Yes! You guessed right because i think someone has posted this before... :| The Bat just closes after 0.1 sec! :(
I really hope that someone know a thing that may work... I can't even run a server with Mopar Client! __ And i really hope this is right section... If it's not please say where i can copy and paste this then if this is wrong section. __ I hope i explained my problem enough for you. __ All help, please :o[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 07:45:49 AM[/size][hr]CLOSED BECAUSE "NO" ONE READ THIS POST! I can't even get help at the official forum :)

item.title: JAVA JDK6u4 did something so i can't run a Server or Client! Please, help needed
item.dc:creator: @dracowizard2 dracowizard2
item.description:
@dracowizard2 wrote:

Hey, i got a problem after downloading JDK 6u4…
I did what a tutorial said and i go to “Advanced” :rolleyes:
Go to that option south of the box, but when i was done and clicked “Ok”…
I just wanted to compile my server then because i had not, and when i compiled it said “JDK file found”
And under that it said “Right bane not found” or something like that…

And now i downloaded “Golden_Scape” Client.
And then i clicked “Run.bat” and what happened?
Yes! You guessed right because i think someone has posted this before…
The Bat just closes after 0.1 sec!

I really hope that someone know a thing that may work…
I can’t even run a server with Mopar Client!
__
And i really hope this is right section…
If it’s not please say where i can copy and paste this then if this is wrong section.
__
I hope i explained my problem enough for you.
__
All help, please :o[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 07:45:49 AM[/size][hr]CLOSED BECAUSE “NO” ONE READ THIS POST!
I can’t even get help at the official forum

Read full topic
